name: misty-terrain
caption: Misty Terrain

effect.short: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming []{type:dragon} moves.
effect.full:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens []{type:dragon} moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes []{move:nature-power} to []{move:moonblast}.

flavorText:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from status
conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type
moves for five turns.
